name: Monkey LCD
description:
Monkey LCD, a simulation of the handheld game.

Mercilessly club monkeys with your monkey whacker as they climb the trees in an attempt to steal your coconuts. Monkeys will start to appear in higher numbers and move faster as you play.

FEATURES:
- High scores via Game Center
- Monkeys, whacking sticks, and coconuts
- Insane monkey whacking action
- Zoom option
